article_title: Nebraska's Medicaid Expansion Plan Puts Truly Needy Patients In Danger

article_metadata.description: Nebraska legislators will be considering another plan to bring Obamacare’s Medicaid expansion to the Cornhusker state. The proposal dubbed the “Transitional Health Insurance Program,” creates a new welfare entitlement for the able-bodied, costing $15 billion over the next ten years. Nebraska policymakers were wise to reject Obamacare’s Medicaid expansion each time it was previously proposed. Nothing in this latest plan warrants a change in direction. In fact, this latest proposal is Nebraska’s most unfavorable yet.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
